p: For the second experiment, I used a MANOVA for a completely randomized design on RGR, final mass (aboveground and belowground), tree condition, non-structural carbohydrates (above- and belowground; also analyzed as the constituents of starch and soluble sugars [ 94, 95, 108], and total nitrogen (above- and belowground), with fire and grasses as the independent variables. I used final total mass (aboveground + belowground) as a covariate.
